Smart Ear Plugs on voice-activated earplugs that use AI technology to filter out background noise while amplifying the sound of music or other audio.
Wireless Ear Plugs on wireless earplugs that connect to a smartphone app, allowing users to control the volume and type of noise-cancellation.
Ear Plugs with Translation Capabilities: Earplugs with built-in translation technology, allowing users to communicate with people who speak different languages while blocking out background noise.
Ear Plugs with Light Therapy: Earplugs that use light therapy to help people fall asleep or improve their mood.
Ear Plugs with Ambient Sound: Earplugs that allow users to hear their surroundings while blocking out certain frequencies, such as loud traffic noise orle.
